displayName: Anthos Cluster on VMware VM Status

timeSeriesQuery.timeSeriesQueryLanguage:
{ fetch k8s_pod::kubernetes.io/anthos/vm_cpu_ready_seconds
  | align rate(1m)
  | add
      [cluster_name:
         if(re_full_match(resource.namespace_name, 'kube-system'),
           resource.cluster_name, resource.namespace_name), node: metric.node]
  | every 1m
  | group_by [resource.project_id, cluster_name, resource.location, node],
      [value_vm_cpu_ready_seconds_aggregate:
         aggregate(value.vm_cpu_ready_seconds)]
; fetch k8s_node::kubernetes.io/anthos/node/cpu/total_cores
  | every 1m
  | add [cluster_name: resource.cluster_name, node: resource.node_name]
  | group_by [resource.project_id, resource.location, cluster_name, node],
      [value_total_cores_aggregate: aggregate(value.total_cores)] }
| join
| div
| mul (100)

{ fetch k8s_pod::kubernetes.io/anthos/vm_virtualdisk_read_latency_seconds
  | align rate(1m)
  | every 1m
  | group_by
      [resource.project_id, resource.cluster_name, resource.location,
       metric.node],
      [value_vm_virtualdisk_read_latency_seconds_sum:
         sum(value.vm_virtualdisk_read_latency_seconds)]
; fetch k8s_pod::kubernetes.io/anthos/vm_number_virtualdisk
  | every 1m
  | group_by
      [resource.project_id, resource.cluster_name, resource.location,
       metric.node],
      [value_vm_number_virtualdisk_sum: sum(value.vm_number_virtualdisk)] }
| join
| div

{ fetch k8s_pod::kubernetes.io/anthos/vm_virtualdisk_write_latency_seconds
  | align rate(1m)
  | every 1m
  | group_by
      [resource.project_id, resource.cluster_name, resource.location,
       metric.node],
      [value_vm_virtualdisk_write_latency_seconds_sum:
         sum(value.vm_virtualdisk_write_latency_seconds)]
; fetch k8s_pod::kubernetes.io/anthos/vm_number_virtualdisk
  | every 1m
  | group_by
      [resource.project_id, resource.cluster_name, resource.location,
       metric.node],
      [value_vm_number_virtualdisk_sum: sum(value.vm_number_virtualdisk)] }
| join
| div
